DOC.brief_summary: Holmium laser prostatectomy enhance void function . Holmium laser prostatectomy enhance sleep quality . Holmium laser prostatectomy enhance renal function . Holmium laser prostatectomy enhance erectile function . Holmium laser prostatectomy enhance health-related quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Changes Urogenital System After Holmium Laser Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Check urodynamic parameter void function evaluation Check low urinary tract symptom ( IPSS : international prostate symptom score ) void function evaluation Check Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index sleep quality evaluation Check estimate glomerular filtration rate urine protein/creatinine ratio renal function evaluation Check International Index Erectile Function score ( IIEF-5 ) erectile function evaluation Check nocturnal penile tumescence parameter erectile function evaluation Check 36-Item Short- Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) evaluation health-related quality life .
DOC.criteria: Prostate size 30 cc transrectal ultrasonography prostatespecific antigen level le 10 ng/ml International prostate symptom score 7 At least one following : Bladder outlet obstruction index > 40 , maximal flow rate < 10 cc/sec , postvoid residual urine > 100cc schäfer grade II Patients want surgery Evidence prostate cancer bladder cancer evaluation treatment All following : Bladder outlet obstruction index le 40 , maximal flow rate 10 cc/sec , postvoid residual urine le 100cc schäfer grade II less Major depressive disorder , Dementia , Parkinson 's disease , Neurological deficit History pelvic radiation therapy Poorly control diabetes mellitus hypertension
